# projections { #ANNarchy.core.Global.projections }

```python
core.Global.projections(
    net_id=0,
    post=None,
    pre=None,
    target=None,
    suppress_error=False,
)
```

Returns a list of all declared populations. 

## Returns {.doc-section .doc-section-returns}

| Name   | Type               | Description                                         |
|--------|--------------------|-----------------------------------------------------|
|        | list\[Projection\] | A list of all assigned projections in this network. |
